item.title: 12 government schools in Karnataka's Raichur to get high-tech science labs
item.description:
<![CDATA[In a move to enhance science education in rural India, 12 government schools in Raichur district in Karnataka will be provided with well-stocked science lab stations to conduct experiments and curated science courseware aligned with the state and National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) syllabi.
This is part of Prayoga Institute of Education Research's Kriya initiative, which aims to transform science learning for over 11,000 students across 77 schools in Karnataka.

item.title: Raichur City Corporation Sets Deadline to Clear Stray Animals from City Roads
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: With stray cattle, pigs, and dogs becoming a growing nuisance on major roads across Raichur city, the Raichur City Corporation has issued a warning to animal owners and caretakers, urging them to take immediate control of their livestock or face penalties.
